parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is provided upon registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is a variable key timestamped Request for all requests. Expires in 3 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The Secret API access string is strictly assigned and personalized to each partner. Used for authentication of the request.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, sm_path, timestamp, access_token. See HMAC-SHA256 Signature Generation Rules

parameters.name: installment_status
parameters.description: The status of installment payment. 1 and 0

error_codes.description: There is no access_token in query

notes: The documentation shows both request parameters and response parameters, along with detailed error codes. The API appears to be related to payment installment status checking.
